properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 21 at 11:58AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
The areas affected include...
Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10 nm...
Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 nm...

At 1158 AM PST, Doppler radar continued to indicate additional
thunderstorms off of the central Oregon Coast, offshore of areas
between Florence, Newport, and Lincoln City. All of these storms
were moving northeast at 30 knots.  Conditions remain favorable for
the formation of additional weak waterspouts early this afternoon,
and brief waterspouts could form with any storm.  In addition, local
45 knot wind gusts and small hail are also possible.

Locations impacted include...
Seal Rock, Waldport, Newport, Yaquina Head, Lincoln Beach, Gleneden
Beach, Otter Rock, Cape Foulweather, Yachats, Depoe Bay, Cape
Perpetua and Lincoln City.
properties.instruction:
Mariners can expect gusty winds to around 30 knots, locally higher
waves, and lightning strikes. Boaters should seek safe harbor
immediately until this storm passes.

NWSheadline: WATERSPOUTS POSSIBLE THIS AFTERNOON OVER THE CENTRAL OREGON COASTAL WATERS
